name: Osh
description: Traditional Uzbek rice dish cooked with tender meat, carrots, onions, and aromatic spices. A hearty and flavorful classic.

name: Tandir Somsa
description: Crispy baked pastry filled with juicy seasoned meat and onions, cooked in a traditional clay oven.

name: Mastava
description: Traditional Uzbek soup made with tender meat, vegetables, and aromatic spices, served warm and comforting.

name: Shashlik
description: Tender, marinated meat grilled to perfection, bursting with traditional Uzbek flavors.

name: Manti
description: Tender dumplings filled with spiced meat.

name: Moshkichri
description: Nutritious mung bean and rice dish, seasoned with traditional spices

name: Lag'mon
description: Savory noodle soup, rich with spices and veggies

name: Qovurma Lag'mon
description: Classic Uzbek noodle dish with flavorful fried meat and fresh veggies.

name: Beshbarmoq
description: The crown jewel of Uzbek cuisine, featuring hand-pulled noodles bathed in a savory, aromatic meat broth, topped with tender, slow-cooked lamb or beef.

name: Qozon Kabob
description: Flavorful slow-cooked meat, capturing the essence of Uzbek cuisine
